ygData.subject: RE: thoughts on screaming mace?
ygData.msgSnippet: That first night, I used it against green wisps, so I expected a lot of procs. It was basically bad luck, I think. Last night I tried it on a few more green
ygData.messageBody:
That first night, I used it against green wisps, so I expected a lot of
procs. It was basically bad luck, I think. Last night I tried it on a few
more green wisps; it went off a lot more often. Then I went hunting blue
Orcs in Oasis with some guildmates - proc'ed a lot less often (since they
were blue), but at least now my 1H blunt is capped at 85.

Thanks for the input.

-Juke

>From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: "'eqbards@onelist.com'" <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] thoughts on screaming mace?
>Date: Thu, 2 Sep 1999 09:16:59 -0600
>
>From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
>I use a Screaming Mace and it procs a lot at 16th level Dex 112. I see it
>proc every fight and most fights it procs several times. I've even had it
>proc on three sucessive attacks. I have spent entire fights yaulped for
>over a minute. Not sure why you aren't seeing many procs, but could just
>be
>some bad days of clumpy random number generation.
>
> Kitasi screaming away happily on E'ci

>-----Original Message-----
>[mailto:jukeboxie@...]
>Sent: Wednesday, September 01, 1999 7:34 PM
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqbards] thoughts on screaming mace?
>From: "Jukeboxie the Bard" <jukeboxie@...>
>
>Am level 16, and just got my screaming mace.

<snip>

>My 1H blunt is currently 76 (the cap at level 16 is 85).

<snip>

>My dex is currently 118, and the mace doesn't seem to proc much.

<snip>
>
> Screaming Mace:
> 1H Blunt
> Damage: 8
> Delay: 35
> Weight: 8 (heavy!)
> Effect: Screaming Mace (Yaulp)
> Damage/Delay = 0.22857
>
> Was previously using Dragoon Dirk:
> Piercing
> Damage: 6
> Delay: 23
> Weight: 2.5
> Damage/Delay = 0.2609
>
>
<snip>
> Thoughts?
>
>-Juke
